messages: `prioridade` enum('baixa','media','alta','critica') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'media',
`updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
stdout:
Table	Create Table
bugs_reportados	CREATE TABLE `bugs_reportados` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
  `user_id` int(11) NOT NULL,
  `titulo` varchar(255) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `descricao` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `categoria` enum('interface','funcionalidade','performance','dados','mobile','outro') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL,
  `prioridade` enum('baixa','media','alta','critica') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'media',
  `status` enum('pendente','em_analise','resolvido','fechado') COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL DEFAULT 'pendente',
  `screenshots` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `pagina_url` varchar(500) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `navegador` varchar(100) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `resolucao` varchar(50) COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `observacoes_admin` text COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci DEFAULT NULL,
  `created_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `updated_at` timestamp NOT NULL DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP ON UPDATE CURRENT_TIMESTAMP,
  `resolvido_em` timestamp NULL DEFAULT NULL,
  `resolvido_por` int(11) DEFAULT NULL,
  PRIMARY KEY (`id`) /*T![clustered_index] CLUSTERED */
) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb4 COLLATE=utf8mb4_unicode_ci
